name: APPS_VLD
body_snippet:
PACKAGE BODY          APPS_VLD
IS
   ------------------- TO GET ITEMS--------------
   FUNCTION GET_ITM (ITEMID NUMBER)
      RETURN CHAR
   IS
      ITM   VARCHAR2 (4000);
   BEGIN
      SELECT ITEM_DESC
        INTO ITM
        FROM ITEMS_MT
       WHERE ITEM_ID = ITEMID;

      RETURN (ITM);
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
      THEN
         RETURN NULL;
   END GET_ITM;


   ------------------ITEM CODE------------
   FUNCTION GET_CODE (ITEMID NUMBER)
      RETURN CHAR
   IS
      ITM   VARCHAR2 (4000);
   BEGIN
      SELECT ITEM_CODE
        INTO ITM
        FROM ITEMS_MT
       WHERE ITEM_ID = ITEMID;

      RETURN (ITM);
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
      THEN
         RETURN NULL;
   END GET_CODE;

   ------------ITEM ID-----------
   FUNCTION ITEM_ID (ITEMCODE CHAR)
      RETURN NUMBER
   IS
      ITM   NUMBER;
   BEGIN
      SELECT ITEM_ID
        INTO ITM
        FROM ITEMS_MT
       WHERE ITEM_CODE = ITEMCODE;

      RETURN (ITM);
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
      THEN
         RETURN NULL;
   END ITEM_ID;

   ----------- GET SO ORDER----------------------
   FUNCTION GET_SOREF (SOID NUMBER)
      RETURN CHAR
   IS
      SO_REF   VARCHAR2 (35);
   BEGIN
      SELECT SO_REF_NO
        INTO SO_REF
        FROM IMK_SO_MT
       WHERE SO_ID = SOID;

      RETURN (SO_REF);
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
      THEN
         RETURN NULL;
   END GET_SOREF;
